subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ only outfield holdovers from 2012, Mike Baxter, Kirk Nieuwenhuis and Lucas Duda, are all left-handed hitters who are trying to prove they are everyday players.
snippet: The Mets’ only outfield holdovers from 2012, Mike Baxter, Kirk Nieuwenhuis and Lucas Duda, are all left-handed hitters who are trying to prove they are everyday players.
